title: Bullet Sound FX - Advanced Collection
description: Top-notch bullet SFX bundling 24 different materials! INCREDIBLE VALUE!
longDescription:
Introducing: Bullet Sound FX - Advanced Collection

$137.77 $119.99! ($23.77 SAVINGS!)


LISTEN TO PREVIEW HERE


Looking for bullet sound effects? Look no further!


Bullet Sound FX - Advanced Collection is a heavy hitter for bullet sound effects.


This must-have sound effects library features a large number of bullet sound effects, from impacts on various materials to whizz and ricochet sounds.


Containing a staggering 960 sounds, this sound pack includes bullet impact sounds for 24 different materials.


Included in this collection:


  1. Wood 1 (wooden plank)
  2. Wood 2 (tree trunk)
  3. Wood 4 (generic)
  4. Metal 1 (heavy)
  5. Metal 2 (sheet metal)
  6. Metal 4 (Steel)
  7. Dirt 1
  8. Dirt 2
  9. Gravel
  10. Ice
  11. Snow
  12. Shallow Water
  13. Deep Water
  14. Sand
  15. Mud
  16. Grass
  17. Vegetation / Leaves
  18. Concrete / Tarmac
  19. Glass 1 (breakable)
  20. Glass 4 (windshield)
  21. Flesh
  22. Guts
  23. Chain Link Fence
  24. Tiles / Ceramic


Available in other bundles & collections from this series (not included in this collection):


  • POV Character Hit
  • Rock
  • Soft Material (cloth)
  • Glass 2 (breakable)
  • Glass 3 (bulletproof)
  • Wood 3 (shattering)
  • Metal 3 (armor plate)
  • Underwater



Crafted to perfection with meticulous attention to detail, these sound effects are designed to fully immerse the player in the action.Â 


The Bullet Sound FX - Advanced Collection is the best link between the smaller Basic Collection and the flagship Ultimate Collection for top-notch bullet sound effects, which makes it the excellent choice for any project involving firearms, guns and weapons.


This collection is part of a larger series and bundles sounds from other products of the series, available individually HERE!

Apart from containing sounds available only in this collection and the flagship Bullet Sound FX - Ultimate Collection, it also bundles sounds from these products at a DISCOUNTED PRICE (incredible value!):


Bullet Sound FX - Metal Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Dirt Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Glass Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Hard Impact Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Water Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Flesh Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Wilderness Bundle

Bullet Sound FX - Wood Bundle
technicalDetails:
Technical Details


Number of Audio Waves: 960

Sample rate: 44,100 Hz

Bit depth: 24 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 14m14s


To use this product, please import the files into your project and use a triggering

script / method of your choice. No special software required.
